long_description: Offering a comfortable pedaling position for long commutes and tours, the men's Cannondale Quick SL 2 bike features a light SL frame, a smooth carbon fork and reliable Shimano Sora components. SL version features refined, lightweight frame tubing and an integrated seat binder to save weight over the standard Quick frame. 6061 aluminum frame features a carbon fork for a versatile, comfortable ride on everything from jaunts to the store to century-length charity rides. Frame also features exaggerated Synapse Active Vibration Elimination (S.A.V.E.) design in seatstays and chainstays to reduce road vibration. Flat handlebar design offers an upright riding position for improved comfort and visibility. Shimano Sora components ensure accurate, dependable shifts throughout the capable 18 gear combinations. Mini-V linear-pull brakes make easy work of speed management. Fast-rolling 700c wheels are outfitted with Kenda Kwick Roller Sport tires for all-around riding. Specs on the Cannondale Quick SL 2 bike are subject to change.
